chart.title: Political corruption index
chart.subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem). It captures the extent to which the executive, legislative, judiciary, and bureaucracy engage in bribery and theft, and the making and implementing of laws are susceptible to corruption.

Political corruption index (central esti.descriptionShort: Central estimate of the extent to which a country is affected by political corruption.
descriptionKey: Measures the extent of political corruption across executive, legislative, judicial, and public sectors.
Includes both petty and grand corruption, such as bribery, embezzlement, and misuse of office.
Higher values (0–1 scale) indicate more pervasive corruption, reversing the typical V-Dem index direction.
Political corruption index (central esti.descriptionProcessing: The regional aggregates (including values for the World) have been estimated by averaging the country values.
